tripreview.Title: "Pump up your adrenaline"
tripreview.sentence: Fantastic holiday option for families.
We as parents loved it too.
Multiple rides to choose from, you can pick what you can digest.
Ideal full day outing place on outskirts of kochi.

tripreview.Title: "Must go"
tripreview.sentence: If you are living or holidaying in Cochin and is not going here is well abit stupid
it's like one of the best place to go
the park is filled with amazing rides both dry and wet and has two 5d theaters hosting different movies
they also have a laser and fountain show which is spectacular but very loud
please do go here if you would like to have fun

tripreview.Title: "Wonderla"
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla amusement park is well popular in Kerala state, among young families and children, which was one of the first such project here.
So it is well accepted excursion place to enjoy and spend time.
Well maintained, trained staff, proper security, good management are the appreciable points in this Park; Can spend a full day and enjoy food of different varieties and taste there;keep it up!

tripreview.Title: "Best amusement park with nice rides!"
tripreview.sentence: We went to wonderla park in Kochi.
This place is worth to visit with lots of rides including land rides and water rides!
The food served in the restaurant is also hygienic and delicious and worth the money!
We did only water rides as we both were fond of water rides only from 11 am till 5 pm.
At the end of the day, we had nice dancing show.
Overall great experience and recommended place to visit!

tripreview.Title: "not so bad"
tripreview.sentence: not so bad,it's a nice for all the type of people.
I think you can easily spent a day for this either blame for a lost day

tripreview.Title: "Good place to spend time"
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla is the best amusement park in India.
You wont even complete taking every rides before you check out as it has a variety of land and water rides.
It is a very good place to be specially with kids or with friends and family.
You will not be able to know how the time fly once you get in.
Lunch and snack outlets are available inside.
Best place to be in Summer.

tripreview.Title: "Best amusement park in Kerala"
tripreview.sentence: This is the best amusement park in Kerala and everybody should go with their kids at least once.
There are so many exciting rides available.
The park is very clean and you get tasty food too.

tripreview.Title: "Amazing Place"
tripreview.sentence: One of the excellent places in Cochin I have visited.
The concept of the park is really good and a must needed place in South India.

tripreview.Title: "Great water theme park"
tripreview.sentence: Excellent place, have visited this place almost 4 times and each time, its been a wonderful experience.
The rides, the games, the food, service all excellent.
The place is always clean and hygienically maintained, i have noticed over the years.
nice place to have fun with family and friends.

tripreview.Title: "Very owecrowdwd "
tripreview.sentence: Its a crowded place school students in large no come in buses nd a long waiting for rides .
fastrack tickets are over expensive.
Dont recomended for tourists it is ok for local people and school groups .
Food is not that good and most of the items get finished .
If u prefer to stand in long waiting then u can go .

tripreview.Title: "Hatts off to Housekeeping team"
tripreview.sentence: Most cleanliest place I have ever seen other than a 5* hotel.
Staffs where helpful, food we had is also excellent, Overall it is an awesome place for 100% fun.

tripreview.Title: "Great day out for families"
tripreview.sentence: Me and my family recently visited Wonderla, its a great day out especially to cool down on a hot day!
My two year old absolutely loved it there is so much to do.
Lovely clean changing areas and you can pay for a locker only thing is the water is freezing in the shower so we waited to get back to the hotel for a shower.
All the pools and rides was lovely and clean and staff where friendly and helpful.

Only complaint was that they had a lot of female and male only sections on some of the attractions which we thought was slightly old fashioned but after we asked the staff they kindly let me and my little girl join my partner.
Entry prices are great value for money and the food on site is lovely.

tripreview.Title: "Better than Bangalore Wonderla"
tripreview.sentence: If you happen to be visit Cochin with families,my sincere suggestion is don't miss wonder la.
Not only kids will have fun but also adults!

tripreview.Title: "Best amusement in India...It's better than Bangalore Wonderla"
tripreview.sentence: The place where you can enjoy the whole day

tripreview.Title: "Good Experience"
tripreview.sentence: A good place for fun, amusement and water theme park.
if you want to get in all rides take a vip ticket and avoid queue.
Try to get in maximum rides.

tripreview.Title: "Good place."
tripreview.sentence: Good place.
Some rides are ageing but overall good place for enjoyment.
There are more land rides than water rides.

tripreview.Title: "the best place to spent time when in kochi"
tripreview.sentence: India has never had a good amusement park till veega land came along, overtime it has developed itself into a world class institution with constantly improving rides and bringing new experience to travellers.
The rides are world class, the ambience is beautiful and the service and safety is top notch.
nothing to complain about here.

tripreview.Title: "Thrilling time at wonderla"
tripreview.sentence: Wonderful place to recharge your mind.
I don't think you can cover up whole rides by one day.
So many rides, thrilling experience, neat and beautiful Eco-culture.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderful Amusement Park"
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla is a wonderful amusement park in Cochin.
Water rides and dry rides were amazing.

tripreview.Title: "Had a very good time in wonder la"
tripreview.sentence: I was so excited to travel to Kerala with my English friends for fun filled holiday.
We had the best experience at this wonderful amusement park the whole day.
I didn't feel like it was too far from the city as the enjoyment we had was fabulous.
Except for the long waiting to get on to different rides.
The excitement took over us by looking at the cleanliness and beautiful Eco-Culture they have maintained so perfectly.
We thought we missed London while coming to India

tripreview.Title: "Best amusement park in south india"
tripreview.sentence: For me Wonderla is the best amusement park in south india.
You would not get enough time to use all rides.
good for a visit with family.

tripreview.Title: "Takes us away from all other thoughts ."
tripreview.sentence: Awesome place to give your body and mind a recharge in one day.
Of course you will visit again, one day is not enough to enjoy all the rides.

tripreview.Title: "Great fun for the entire family"
tripreview.sentence: The water rides and dry rides make up for a good amusement park experience.
Many option for food cater to a variety of audience.
Don't be surprised by the people not in swimwear on the water rides, its a water park catering to all kinds of people and even has certain sections divided for men and women separately.
I salute their thought behind this concept and am glad that more people can enjoy the water rides.

tripreview.Title: "Best Amusment Park in South india"
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla (previously known as Veegaland) is one the best amusement parks in South India and is suitable for any age.
There are lots of adventure filled rides, swimming pools, water rides, Manorama cave, etc.
One can relax a whole day inside the park.

tripreview.Title: "Good and excellent amusement park"
tripreview.sentence: This is one of the best amusement park located near ernakulam.
It is around 30km from cochin air port and 12km from ernakulam railway station.
This very attractive for children as well as others.
You can enjoy lot with budgetary price and good safety.

tripreview.Title: "super"
tripreview.sentence: Great entertaiment with family.
world class rides and nice hospitality.
very neat and clean.

tripreview.Title: "One of the top attraction of Kochi city"
tripreview.sentence: We will get a water resistant electronic watch while paying for tickets.
You can charge the watch for any amount and you can utilize this for paying foods , Drinks etc.
Locker key is also provided with a wrist band , such that we can put it on one hand and it will be safe throughout.
Locker chargers is 100 Rs and 200 Rs as the caution deposit.
Chicken Biriyani and Egg Biriyani is costly according to quantity(150 and 100 Rs), but its tasty.
Alcohol is strictly discouraged.
There are prayer rooms / feeding rooms.
My favourite ride is Wonder Splash Travel tips : Wonderla is 18 kms from Kochi/Ernakulam city center (Ernakulam Junction railway staion).
Take any bus towards Kakkanad (frequent from city) and you will get Bus to Pallikkara/Wonderla from there.
Direct Bus to Pallikkara are available from the city .
But they are not frequent,people coming to Wonderla from Alappuzha direction , use Kundannoor - Pettah - Trippunithura - Karimukal - Pallikkara - Wonderla route.

tripreview.Title: "Best Water park in Kerala.."
tripreview.sentence: My experiences of Wonderla spans multiple visits in a decade and extends from Kochi to Bangalore.
the place is well maintained and exactly looks the same as it was 10 years ago, except for the fading of colors of water rides and accessories which are quite natural in the sun.
the water hygiene, the toilet facilities, the food area with tasty and quality dishes, and the rides are the best in world standards and maintenance
not to forget the umpteen staffs present in the park and the lifeguards, always coming to your help
the timing is 11am to 6pm, the land rides has to be finished first and the water rides will start at 1pm
I have never completed the land rides which are quite scary and adventurous to me, but has been to almost all the water rides
I have visited both Wonderlas, the Bangalore one being linked to resort stays also
so far not even a bad experience
Go for it if your are in Kerala or planning to visit in Kochi.
Hats off to the team

tripreview.Title: "Hilltop Fun-Park of Kochi"
tripreview.sentence: We had a pleasure trip to Wonderla during the Christmas holidays of 2015.
Enjoyed the Water rides (some are pretty amazing n thrilling) n a few land rides.
A few multimedia experiences were also enjoyable.
There are many food outlets in here with nominal rates.
Quite enjoyable cuisines.
They've reliable locker and changing facilities.
Also they give facility in the form of a wearable rubber covered watch as a mode of plastic currency so that one doesn't have to carry the money in hand.
They charge a refundable 100 rupees for it's use for the entire time.
It's one of the best places to have fun family trips.
The one negative point I have to mention is that water quality in general wave pool is quite bad, but in the family wave pool it's within the quality limits.
Though not much directions are given on the way to the destination, with Google Maps, it's pretty easy getting there.
We enjoyed the time spent there with beautiful distant views of the Kochi City from the hill top.
Happy times !

tripreview.Title: "Best park in south India"
tripreview.sentence: been here few times before
visited again in december and was very happy to see lot a new rides and better restaurants than before.
always a fun place to be.
entry fee has rocketed though.

tripreview.Title: "Amazing amusement park"
tripreview.sentence: So much fun :) best place for enjoyment with family and friends :) Awesome amusement park :) Worth visiting this place if you plan Cochin.

tripreview.Title: "Amusement unlimited"
tripreview.sentence: Amazing park to visit with your family, lot of rides pools facilities and most important thing is cleanliness and hygiene.
dont miss this high quality place when time of visiting cochin, you need more than one day to finish all amazing rides and coasters inside.

tripreview.Title: "Loosen up"
tripreview.sentence: One of the very few places in Kerala to loosen up and enjoy
Twas kinda difficult to find the place
they don't have instructions/arrows placed at necessary spots
Thanx to Google maps, finding wonderla was easy
parking and check-in were trouble free
The place is well maintained with proper directions
better to have an idea of which all rides are where all
so I would suggest u spend 15 minutes with the map provided and plan ur visits to different rides
water rides will be populated by evening and land rides in d afternoon time.
if u want to go through the rides more than once, its better to get the FASTTRACK tickets
otherwise the waiting line is long
would have to wait 20-30 mins sometimes
take whatever money u can inside
like the food is costly and photographs are also costly
and they don't let u out once inside
but have good lockers
and they have electronic keys which act as money machines
so u don't have to carry hard cash while going on rides
my fav ride - SPACEGUN !

tripreview.Title: "WONDERLA"
tripreview.sentence: its truly a good amusement park with awesome rides
really good to visit with friends and family

tripreview.Title: "Wonderla!! Good but impossible to cover everything in a day"
tripreview.sentence: It's fun when you are here.
You can take an auto or bus from Aluva byepass if you are coming here from the airport.
There is a lot of rides including water rides.
Most of them will make you go wow!
However, it is tough to cover all the rides because most of them are having distance from each other.
Tip is to go for as much land rides before lunch and post lunch go for water rides.
This will make you feel relaxed as well!
It is fun to get kids here but you need to be careful and not to leave them alone.
Food available here is average and food outlets are way too crowded.

tripreview.Title: "Very good place "
tripreview.sentence: Its really wonderful and amazing place for water play and more.
The safety and clean factors are good comparing to other water theme parks inside and out side kerala .

tripreview.Title: "Improved a lot"
tripreview.sentence: Well maintained and properly managed the property had improved a lot in providing better fun,entertainment and memories by rides, water park themes and amusements for the whole family.
Restaurants were clean and neat.

tripreview.Title: "What a tour"
tripreview.sentence: Have enjoyed a lot on new rides.
They increased their rides so plenty of them are available But we can't complete every ride by the dawn you have take 2 days to complete the whole rides
Just keep yourself ready for an adventure.

tripreview.Title: "Fun with the rides"
tripreview.sentence: Adventure thrill water games and a perfect place for family outing.
We went as a group of four families with children and had a great time together in the rides.
Loved the food and the clean environment.

tripreview.Title: "Really Wonderful"
tripreview.sentence: A very nice water theme park and the best in Kerala.
Lot of rides and kids amusements.
Try the dry rides first.
Must reach there by 10am to enjoy all the rides.
The food counters, locker facilities, cash payments, etc.
are all excellent.
The wave pool and other water rides were best.
On the down side it's bit costly.
Also beware of hidden photography.

tripreview.Title: "Best in India"
tripreview.sentence: Really enjoyed the dry as well as water rides.
Its good for all age groups.
They some really interesting rides which are definitely not found in other parks in India.
This is a ONCE IN A LIFE TIME MUST visit place.

tripreview.Title: "Refreshment in my life"
tripreview.sentence: I visited wonderla in my last vacation,all the rides are vere fantastic and you should like this amusement park,if you looking to relax some moment in your life you can go to there,costs are comparatively low nice place to enjoy.

tripreview.Title: "Excellent place"
tripreview.sentence: the wonderala amusement park is a nice place .
we happily entertained everything there .

tripreview.Title: "nice trip"
tripreview.sentence: the wonderla amusement park is very nice .
we enjoyed a lot.
rides are too good .
a really nice happily trip .

tripreview.Title: ""Indeed a Wonderlaaaaa!!!!!""
tripreview.sentence: Nice rides-both dry and water,Sea wave is a must go area.
Nice arrangements to keep your baggage - they provide safe deposit cabinets for luggages even the size of suitcases!
Food in their restaurants is very nice.
Kids and adults alike will love this park as there are enough and more activities to do here.
Need one full day to explore this place.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderla Amusement Park"
tripreview.sentence: it was very nice trip to this park last summer, my family has enjoied it and we spent the time by playing all the attraction there,.

tripreview.Title: "A day destination"
tripreview.sentence: Went to this place when it was Vega Land.
I am not a liker of theme parks but still had to spend time here because of friends.
Water games were very good.
In the land games, i enjoyed a few and then took a ride with Twin Flip monsters.
I was totally out for that day after the ride.
For the people who love theme parks, this is the best ride in the park !

tripreview.Title: "Quality Fun time guaranteed!"
tripreview.sentence: I have been to quite a few amusement parks but this is by far the neatest and best amusement parks I have been to in India.
I don't think there have been any new rides added to the park for a while now, the dry rides are ok but you would find yourself spending more time at the water rides.
There are pretty decent places to eat at and it would be an excellent option for a family outing.

tripreview.Title: "fun fun and lots of fun"
tripreview.sentence: really a place to visit.
food is available.
things to play eat ,run ,laugh and everything.
had an wonderful experience.
there is a lot to play .
please do visit with a group of freinds.

tripreview.Title: "well managed"
tripreview.sentence: I can say professionally managed,neat and systematic.
we wont lost our way.
can enjoy to the maximum.

tripreview.Title: "One of the frequent visit"
tripreview.sentence: I like wondela altogether, but it feels a bit out dated now.
we still enjoy it,but it can be made to international standards with a little more effort .

tripreview.Title: "amuzing"
tripreview.sentence: it was a joyfull trip to Wonderla Cochin we friends enjoyed a lot and the digiphotographer took a group photo of our but we forgot to took this from the entrance may you please send the image to my gmail i will send the number of picture Email : johnsonuthuppan62@gmail.

tripreview.Title: "first trip but worth it"
tripreview.sentence: if you come to Cochin,you shouldn't miss this amusement park.
while coming from munnar we plan to go to here.
it was our honey trip.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderfull Amusement Park"
tripreview.sentence: It is a real wonderfull amusement park, children, youngsters, elderly, even heart patients can select some of the rides.
It is situtated little bit away from the busy town.
Different type of food is available inside the park.
Since they are adding rides every now and then one full day is not sufficent to cover all rides.

tripreview.Title: "Best in Kerala"
tripreview.sentence: You sure would know that this is the best water theme park experience in Kerala once you visit this place.

tripreview.Title: "Nice Amusement Park"
tripreview.sentence: Me and friends went to Wonderla on October.
We was 16 pax group.
We have enjoyed alot in this Amusement park.
Dry and Water activities are superb.
That was my 4th time to this amusement park.

tripreview.Title: "Recent visit to Wonderla"
tripreview.sentence: Great experience.
We enjoyed a lot.
tried most of the water rides.

tripreview.Title: "One of the best in India"
tripreview.sentence: and May be South India's Best amusement park.

tripreview.Title: "super place"
tripreview.sentence: I went there lot of time with my friend in my school and most probley with ,my family.
each time we all visit new ride are there .
I went there when the name was veegaland ,in the staring stage, I mean when this amusement park was stared.
I remember in that starting time there was a baby elephant was there .
only few rides was there in the staring time .
when time pass new development I mean new exiting rides, for every age of people .
my only wish is that go there with my cousins again.
my cousin were so much happy to go there, we all feel that we all became kids .
its a beautiful place good behaviour and good hospitably from all there staff.

tripreview.Title: "Good"
tripreview.sentence: First go for the dry ride than go for the water rides.
The only ride we didn't like is the cine magic ride not worth it.
You can buy clothes inside.
The food was good.

tripreview.Title: "Great rides"
tripreview.sentence: I visited this place a some time back and it was one of the best experiences ever.

tripreview.Title: "Excellent"
tripreview.sentence: This is a nice place everybody can enjoy and relax with family or friends.
this is the one of top rated water theme park in India.

tripreview.Title: "FULL DAY RELAXATION"
tripreview.sentence: This is a place everybody can enjoy and relax with family or friends.
this is the one of top rated water theme park in india also in asia.
very hygienic place with all safety standards.
there are 3 theatres inside to experience .
several rides to thrill and we can feel '0' gravity.
water based rides are also enthusiastic.
we can avail several discounts according to the size of the team planning to visit the park.

tripreview.Title: "A good place, but over crowded and overly charged"
tripreview.sentence: Its a nice place for a day visit, but always found over crowded and you won't be able to enjoy 50% of the rides due to the crowd.
Also I would call it overly charged.

tripreview.Title: "A place to relax and enjoy"
tripreview.sentence: this a very nice place for enjoyment.
had a lot of fun here.
rides were all awesome.
food at anteen was also nice.

tripreview.Title: "Excellent outdoor park in Kerala"
tripreview.sentence: Recommended for kids
and will feel 1 day won't be sufficient and the water are cleaned and well maintained.

tripreview.Title: "time just flies"
tripreview.sentence: u get in by 11 am and u never know how it is evenig already there are so many rides and shows and pools.

tripreview.Title: "A 'do-not-miss' entertainment for kids and family"
tripreview.sentence: Of all the dozen or so water parks that we have visited across the country, Wonderla Kochi stands out for world-class standards and facilities.
The maintenance of the rides, cleanliness, ambience, food and service from staff all provide memorable experiences from each visit.
We never had an 'irritant' even after many visits.
A full day outing for the entire family (over the entire age group) highly recommended.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderla relaxation for your kids"
tripreview.sentence: Veegaland becomes wonderla but not like Bangaluru wonderla.
The Area and rides are very lesser than bangaluru park.
Also you must take care about your transportation from park.
Because not bus and taxi services available from the park.
if you return late evening you will get caught.
Also you must take care about traffic of Kochin.
The staff of this amusement parks are very courteousness and nice.
Water rides are very very good.
but no heaters available to relax.

tripreview.Title: "Don't compare with Bangalore "
tripreview.sentence: It certainly is a great amusement park on a hill top but again its always better to get fasttrack as to avoid the rush .
I would suggest to go for water rides as whre we get in to the water because it's not hygienic enough ( you know y) but other rides are pretty peaceful as they don't involve water
there is a few rides which is not available as the one in bangalore
but a few new rides if ur coming from bangalore.
Either way i would always prefer bangalore over this.

tripreview.Title: "Good water games and may enjoy some other games also for variety."
tripreview.sentence: Enjoy the water rides as much as possible.
Long queues may irritate you at few rides like family splash.
you have an option to pay double and avoid the queue.
the wave pool will also be interesting.
non swimmers may prefer the 1.5 m depth pool.
Please monitor the timings of wave pool, music fountain etc and plan your trip.

tripreview.Title: "Only for water games"
tripreview.sentence: Water games are somewhat okay when you are with friends or family.
Thrill rides are not that much thrill and not worth it.
We have to go only for water games or just because we are in Cochi.

tripreview.Title: "wounderla trip"
tripreview.sentence: its really great water park.
especially for children and students.
i was totally enjoyed.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderful Wonderla!"
tripreview.sentence: We visited the giant adventure park in August 2015.
It is a major attraction to school kids and adults alike.
There are dry land and water rides.
It was mainly the water rides that attracted us.
There are rides to suit most ages and the premises are very clean.
Our favourite was the wave pool.
Food is available on site.
An excellent park to spend the day with friends and family.

tripreview.Title: "Are you in Bangalore or Mysore or nearby, then is a Must Visit."
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla, one of the must visit place if you are in Bangalore or in Mysore or somewhere in its near vicinity.
Wonderful Dry and Wet Rides.
Most of dry rides are thrilling, ample seating area for the elderly person to sit and watch their loved ones enjoying the rides.
The quality of the food is average, don't expect to have a very good quality.
It is advice during the weekends or Public holidays to get a VIP / Express pass when you enter so that you need not have to wait for the rides long.
though its the double the charge of the general entry but in a crowded day its worth it.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderful Amusement Park Wonderla"
tripreview.sentence: Very good and enjoyable amusement park for all Ages.
We had been with family to this Amusement park during May 2015.
The entry fee is much on the higher side Rs 580 per adult.
However taking into account the maintenance and the safety measures they provide, I think this entree fee is OK.
Outside food is strictly not allowed.
There are few good restaurants inside the park, which cater our needs.
Lot of rides to come with this Rs 580/- Many many water rides, really enjoyable.
My family was in full enjoyment on that day and particularly my grandson (5 years) enjoyed fully
He was reluctant to come back from the park.

tripreview.Title: "Top of hill, full of thrill"
tripreview.sentence: A must visit place for all, though one will not be enough to cover the whole park.
A fun place for people of all ages, toddlers to the very old.
Very well maintained, with all sorts of safety and health measures strictly followed.
Outside food and beverages are not allowed inside, which is well taken care by the restaurants.

tripreview.Title: "Worthy to visit"
tripreview.sentence: This is an excellent amusement park I ever visited.

tripreview.Title: "Amusedd......"
tripreview.sentence: one among the best amusement park in the world
clean
we have enjoyed a lot here.

tripreview.Title: "Funtime...."
tripreview.sentence: We visited on 27th August 2015 We had a very good time .
kids enjoyed a lot.
The park is well maintained ,clean and most of the staff are well behaved Lots of rides
to enjoy
It's better to take fast track ticket if there is lot of crowd to avoid the rush at the rides The food is OK

tripreview.Title: "No.1 Amusement park in India"
tripreview.sentence: The best in India!
i have been here for almost 5 to 6 times.
They have the best water theme rides,and land rides too.
It has been conferred as the No.
1 Amusement park in India.
If you come to visit kochi, its then a must visit place for you!
I am sure you will love it!

tripreview.Title: "Wonder la -Cochin"
tripreview.sentence: One of the best place to spend ideal time with friends and family when you are in Kerala.
wonderla amusement park located in Pallikara.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderla - Wonderful"
tripreview.sentence: No doubt, this is the best amusement park in india.
I been to many parks all over india and i felt this as the best in terms of safety and cleanliness.
Management given much care to make the water and other surroundings clean through out the time.
World class fun activities arranged well for kids and adults.
Loved the day.

tripreview.Title: "Good Park"
tripreview.sentence: It is a good park with all the usual water and amusement rides.
Kids and children will enjoy it.
Be sure to be smart head towards the big rides instead of going by the map.
The lines get really long and you will end waiting in line.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderful and Amazing"
tripreview.sentence: This beautiful Park is really wonderful and amazing with so many rides, water games and food options giving enjoyment, entertainment and memories.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderla Amusement Park"
tripreview.sentence: very nice and so many items to enjoy with friends and family.
A full day amusement and fun.
Food is little more costly.

tripreview.Title: "Amazing entertainment park"
tripreview.sentence: Its was an amazing experience.
I enjoyed being there.
I enjoyed being in the water games.
Its well maintained and clean.
The view from some part of the park is really beautifull.

tripreview.Title: "Fun Ride"
tripreview.sentence: Very nice amusement park with lot rides, full enjoyment.
There is lot of food options available in the park Its bit crowded so need to wait in queues.

tripreview.Title: "Adrenaline rush"
tripreview.sentence: A very good experience of wet and dry rides.
I had gone to water park with my wife and was totally blown away by the experience that the place has to offer.

tripreview.Title: "Expensive but fun !!!"
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla is one place which we felt as a family that is expensive but amazing fun.
Water is very good and well maintained.
The flip side would be when we go as a family
the women and children were asked to go seperate on most water games and the other one being the expensive ticket.
Must enjoy if you like rides and water games.
